boardgame.name: Magic Madness 10: Spells For OSR Games
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

It came slow, the 10th Magic Madness. Out of the depths of madness the one eyed book has crawled. It is here and it is watching you!

30 spells it has been watching over, fuming over their many eyes:

Cyclop's Anger, the fury of the one eyed against the many.

Pursuit Hook, have trouble chasing a foe... let the hook slow it down.

Winged Bullet, a nice bird you have but when it becomes a bullet look out!

Kaxas The Wrong, an oil business elephant or is it more then that?

Bitsy Burglars For Hire, yes sometimes the tiny thieves are needed to get that special thing out of the safe.

Crime Shackler, the sheriff is busy but with this spell it's time for you to do the arrest.

Fury From Burning Heart Factory, something is wrong with this horse but it feels so right!

Smiler Joy, a nice smiling lady will give your party the special smiles they need.

Words Wound, say the wrong thing and your dead!

Ice Over Sucking Water, put some ice on the floor and your foes will find the water underneath.

30 spells for you to read with your many eyes. A 10th madness is not a book you should ignore. It is here to stare at you, Magic Madness 10!

boardgame.name: Lost Worlds
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

A collection of 8 worlds for Stars Without Number that have been cut of from outside contact for a long while there is much to gain if you can work out how to deal with the unique problems that come from operating in these places.

These ideas could easily be fitted into many different role playing systems.

boardgame.name: The Hound Knight
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

An original short bounty hunt for 3rd- to 4th-level characters

A dark knight is kidnapping locals under pretense, accusing them of false crimes. In secret, the knight is bringing human chattel to a dark master. Can the heroes intercede before it’s too late?

boardgame.name: Longboard
boardgame.description:
It's a beautiful day at the beach, and the surfers are out shopping for new boards. Create the coolest and biggest longboards to establish your surfboard-shaping shop as the best in town. Surf's up!

In Longboard, players draft and trade surfboard pieces as they attempt to build the tallest and most surfboards. More specifically, on a turn you take two actions, with three types of actions being possible:


Add a card from the deck to your personal supply, that is, cards lying face up in front of you.
Take a card from your supply to start or lengthen a board; all cards in a board have to be the same color (or wild) and each new card on a board must be equal to or greater in value than the card below it.
Place one or more cards in your supply in an opponent's supply, then take a single card from their supply of value less than the sum of what you gave them and use this card to start or lengthen a board.


Each board card features 1-3 stickers, which count as points when the surfboard is complete, that is, when it contains at least four cards. When a player has 3-4 complete boards, at least one of which contains 7+ cards, they can choose to end the game. If that doesn't happen before the deck runs out, the game ends at that point. Players then score sticker points on completed boards, lose points for incomplete boards, and score bonus points if they have the longest completed board or the most completed boards or if they have completed any of the four random objective cards put into play at the start of the game.
boardgame.commerceweblink: Geek Game Shop listing for Longboard

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Rainbow Blvd.
boardgame.description:
Build rainbows to make the city of Hopewell Springs beautiful while creating 3D masterpieces in Rainbow Blvd! In Rainbow Blvd. players are animal architects, tasked with completing city plans and private contracts with the goal of gaining the most prestige to become the next head architect at the rainbow factory.

Rainbow Blvd. is played over a series of days (rounds). Each day begins with players acquiring city plan cards that will reward them for building specific rainbow segments and arcs around the city. However, take on too many city plans, and there is a risk of losing prestige for uncompleted work.

While the rainbow factory pays well, there are always opportunities for private contracts to help. The 6 local color companies that produce the materials used by the rainbow factory want their hues to be used whenever possible. Each is willing to offer more prestige to whomever completes their various goals.

The player who manages to collect the most prestige points before spring is the winner and new head architect at the rainbow factory! Rainbow Blvd. utilizes several fun mechanics including action selection, hand management, a time track, set collections, and more, resulting in a wonderfully beautiful experience around any game table!

boardgame.name: Rise of Vecna
boardgame.description:
From the back of the book:

Tiamat has been successfully summoned to the Forgotten Realms. Demon Lords prowl the Underdark. The Ordning is shattered. Baldur’s Gate has been swallowed up by Avernus.

And amidst the chaos presides the Maimed Lord Vecna.

Rise Of Vecna imagines a world where all the various catastrophes threatened in a Wizards of the Coast hardcover adventure have come to pass. The Realms are in ruin and it falls to your players to pick up the pieces. While doing so they will travel across the Sword Coast — from the Greater Mines of Mirabar to the undersea fortress known as the Maelstrom. Along the way they will advance from 3rd to 10th level, possibly putting an end to Vecna’s dire machinations.

boardgame.name: Angry Birds Don't See Red
boardgame.description:
Come up with the right words, find your way through the maze, spot the differences and land the die right to score high! Each task is a fun challenge, but who will win?

During their turn players pick a card from a shared deck. Each card is a mini game using the game components. The winner of each card takes the card as a victory point. Once any player has 5 cards they win the game.

boardgame.name: Pirates of Carey Bean
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Players are sent to assassinate a rising pirate who is disrupting trade routes.

boardgame.name: Ashtwig's Bidding
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

The forest is dying. But it’s not innocent

In the deeps of the forest, the giant treant Ashtwig is calling out for help. It has fallen ill to a creature nesting in its roots, it’s magic slowly fading away. The treant promises adventurers high rewards for their help.

The adventurers must travel inside the tree, up to its crown to befriend and convince a living weapon to join their fight before making their way down into the infested roots, fighting creatures in the dark and hallucinations in their minds.

And even if they win the fight – the treant might have not been quite honest about its motives to begin with.

boardgame.name: Medieval Encounters
boardgame.description: Enter a world where running into another hero more often than not leads to a duel to the death! Play your cards just right in this strategy RPG duel card game where danger lurks around every corner. But be sure to balance your actions while devising your devilish schemes, because outplaying your opponent is crucial: their demise equals your success!

boardgame.name: Lasca & Caos
boardgame.description:
Argentinian compilation of Laska and Chaos.


World Chess Champion Emanuel Lasker developed Laska (a.k.a. Lasca), a variant of the Checkers Family, in 1911. The game board and play resembles that of Checkers, but captured pieces remain on the board and can possibly be freed later in the game.

Each player starts the game on the 7x7 board with eleven soldiers. On a turn, a player moves one soldier diagonally forward one space. If a capture is available, then the player must make that capture, trapping the captured piece underneath the capturing one; if the newly captured piece had previously had one or more pieces underneath it, then those pieces are now free to move in future turns. If a soldier reaches the opponent's back row, it's flipped and promoted to an officer, which can move diagonally in all directions. The game continues until either a player can't move or a player has no pieces remaining on the board. In both cases, this player loses the game.


In Chaos, The object of the game is to move your six playing pieces from one side of the board to the opposite side. The game is played by either two or four players. The catch is that the pieces all look identical; they are identified by a colored ring on their underside only.

On your turn, you move a piece forward, sideways or diagonally, possibly jumping over a single piece (a series of jumps is possible if the right gaps are present, as in Checkers). When a piece reaches the far side, it is turned over to reveal its true owner. If yours, it stays there; if not, it reverts to its indistinguishable side and its true owner must move it on his next turn. During play, you can also challenge the ownership of a piece being moved. The incorrect player forfeits his turn.

boardgame.name: The Eidolon of the Ape
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Adepts of Evil

Innocent men and women are being ritually strangled on the white jade altar of the grim ape god Simatala! Do you sneak into the temple to rescue the prisoners, or are you strong enough to face the evil adepts of the ape god directly?

Savage Swords and Sinister Sorcery

"The Eidolon of the Ape" is a stand-alone sword and sorcery adventure module, inspired by the pulp era tales of Robert E. Howard and Clark Ashton Smith. Venture in the footsteps of Conan the Cimmerian, Satampra Zeiros of Uzuldaroum, Imaro of Nyumbani, and other fabled thieves, reavers and slayers!

Book features:

A fully detailed sword and sorcery adventure for character levels 3-4
Use as a stand-alone module for an evening or two of play, or use the background information as the basis for several adventures
A mix of stealth, dungeon exploration, and deadly combat -- a chance for every character class to shine!
City and dungeon maps
New monsters and NPCs
New magic items

boardgame.name: Fire for Light
boardgame.description:
The villagers of Summer's End are preparing for the coming of Malwinter — a strange and legendary season with the harshest snows and deadly cold. Take control of a new generation of explorers, the most valued members of Summer's End who go out every day in search of food, materials, or other resources that the village uses to survive:


Narii, who believes there's something in the nearby mountain range that can help the village survive.
Narii's sister Iris, a village guard who helps fend off the bandits who steal valuable resources and materials.
The apprentice blacksmith, Jasper, who has been trying to build something impressive enough for his teacher for seven years.
Or, finally, Ouop, a mysterious robot who assists the villagers but can communicate only by saying his name.


Fire for Light is a campaign-driven game played out over at least fifteen chapters. During each chapter, you set up a new scenario with new enemies and objectives. Most importantly, players are given choices that will change the outcome of their games and give them access to different rewards or shape future chapters differently.

A chapter is played over several rounds, each culminating in daylight progressing to darkness. Fire for Light uses a unique "Awareness" system to determine which characters (both friend and foe) activate. When an explorer takes their turn, they utilize actions they have available from different sources such as item or ability cards, their explorer mats, or other scenario-specific actions. These allow the characters to move, attack, gather resources, explore the wilderness, or countless other effects. When an enemy activates, they follow behaviors from top-to-bottom and roll a number of dice whenever they move.

Make your choices and uncover the mystery of this snowy world in Fire for Light!

—description from the publisher
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: Fire for Light: Red Water Depths

boardgame.name: 東方采霊弾 (Tohosaireidan)
boardgame.description:
東方采霊弾 (Tohosaireidan) is a 'Living Card Game (LCG)' from Japan for two players. It is unofficially based on the popular video game series Touhou Project which introduced the 'bullet hell' mode of play.

In the card game, players choose two of four characters to compete, and each character has their own deck of 18 cards, from which 12 are used.

The game also uses dice to enable cards to be played and for characters to build up their strengths on a character board. The dice have four symbols, a red sun, a blue moon, a green star, and a black Taijitu symbol (popularly known in the West as Yin and Yang). Players roll the six dice, and can hold two and re-roll the rest.

The decks include Barrage cards for bullet hell, which can be used offensively or defensively. Players use their dice rolls to bring cards into play, and then activate them next turn. The goal is to exhaust your opponent's hit points to win the battle and the game.

Players make tactical choices as they develop their decks, but the game also carries a dose of luck with the dice.
user summary

Shoot back! Bulletstorm Card Battle! Use your spell cards to line up your barrage! Beat back your opponent's barrage with your barrage! Team up with your chosen characters and fight with your own unique strategy!

What is Tohou Saireidan?

Toho Saireidan is a two-player LCG (Living Card Game) based on the shooting game from the Toho Project.

In addition to the fun of building a deck of unique cards, you can also enjoy the luck of the special dice, the offsetting of bullets, and the feeling of actually playing a bullet battle.
Experience a new kind of barrage battle!

Included characters
The following four characters are included in the first game.
Reimu Hakurei
Marisa Kirisame
Remilia Scarlett
Flandre Scarlett

撃ち返せ!!弾幕カードバトル!スペルカードで弾幕を並べろ！相手の弾幕は弾幕で打ち消せ！選んだキャラでタッグを組んで、自分だけの戦略で戦え！

東方采霊弾とは

東方采霊弾(さいれいだん)は「東方Project」のシューティングゲームを元にした2人用対戦型LCG(Living Card Game)です。

個性豊かなカードでデッキを構築する楽しみだけでは無く、特製ダイスの運要素や弾幕同士の相殺、実際に弾幕バトルをしているような感覚が味わえます。
新しい弾幕バトルを体験してみて下さい。

収録キャラクター
第一弾に収録されているキャラクターは以下の4人になります。
・博麗 霊夢
・霧雨 魔理沙
・レミリア・スカーレット
・フランドール・スカーレット
publisher's summary
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Video Game Theme: Project Shrine Maiden
boardgame.boardgameexpansion: 東方采霊弾 紅魔館 (Tohosaireidan Komakan)

boardgame.name: Frases de Mente
boardgame.description:
An Argentinian trivia game about famous quotes.

More than 1,300 famous, funny or curious phrases present you with as many challenges: try to remember or guess who said them and, if you succeed, advance on the board in a wild race with the other players.

On each turn, a roll of the dice will tell you which question to answer. There are always several options to choose from and where your memory fails, your wits or luck can pull you through. Those who get it right advance on the board, and the first to complete two laps wins.

Those old television ads, the slogans (and the whores) of politicians, the reflections of writers and philosophers, the most quoted sayings, the statements of actors, stars, kings and rockers are material for fun and memory in a fascinating game, ideal for meetings between friends or family. Also included is a variant to read and play individually.

boardgame.name: 東方采霊弾 紅魔館 (Tohosaireidan Komakan)
boardgame.description:
東方采霊弾 紅魔館 (Tohosaireidan Komakan) is an expansion to 東方采霊弾 (Tohosaireidan), which introduces new characters and weapons/equipment that help the characters fight more.

Publisher says:
Fill the battlefield with a barrage!
This is the first expansion of Tōhō's Dairei Bullets!

Three players from the Red House, Patchouli, Misuzu, and Sakuya, have joined the battle!

The barrage of card battles will become even more intense and vivid!

A new equipment system has been added for the three new characters!

What is the equipment system?

By equipping special cards to your characters or specific cards, you can strengthen their attacks and improve their basic performance.

To play this expansion, you need to have the basic set of "Touhou Shireidan".

Characters included
The following three characters are included in the first expansion.
For more information about the cards and rules, please visit the dedicated website.

Sakuya Jurokuyo
Beni Misuzu
Patchouli Norledge

戦場を弾幕で埋め尽くせ！
東方采霊弾拡張第一弾！

紅魔館から「パチュリー」「美鈴」「咲夜」の3人が参戦

弾幕カードバトルは更に激しく鮮やかに！

新たな3人のキャラクターには専用の装備システムも追加！

装備システムとは

装備専用カードをキャラクターや特定のカードに装備させる事で、攻撃を強化したり基本性能をアップさせたりすることができます。

※この拡張を遊ぶには基本セットとなる『東方采霊弾』が必要です。

収録キャラクター
拡張第一弾に収録されているキャラクターは以下の3人になります。
詳しいカードの内容、ルールは専用サイトで確認できます。

十六夜 咲夜
紅 美鈴
パチュリー・ノーレッジ
publisher's summary

boardgame.name: The Corruption of Chelmsford
boardgame.description:
In the valley of Ul-Kara, at a narrowing of the River Chelm, sits the town of Chelmsford, mostly known for its fine ales, ciders, and beers, but also for the Abbey of Keshval, Mother of Waters, Pourer of Life. The Abbey is mostly known for its fine clay pouring vessels, fired in exotic colors, known far and wide as the sturdiest jugs in the land.

For years the Abbey and the city lived in harmony, with pottery coming down the hill to be filled with cider and beer, but recently, something has gone wrong in the valley, and no one has come down from the Abbey in weeks.

The Kein brewery is running out of jugs, and people in the village have started to disappear: most recently, the son of Hiram Kein himself, who’s mad with fear and offering high sums for anyone who can bring him and the enforcer he sent after him home.

boardgame.name: Touhou Luna Nights
boardgame.description:
Touhou Luna Nights is a Metroidvania action-adventure Touhou Project fangame developed by Team Ladybug.

Source: Wikipedia, "[en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Touhou_Luna_Nights Touhou Luna Nights]", available under the CC-BY-SA License.

boardgame.name: Too Many Bones: Crossover Loot Promo Pack
boardgame.description:
This is a crossover loot pack that features new hilarious Loot and Trove Loot cards referencing other Chip Theory Games, including burncycle and Cloudspire.

Contains 3 Cards
X2 Loot cards
X1 Trove Loot cards

boardgame.name: Gira Torino
boardgame.description:
Gira Torino is the game that will drag everyone around the city to identify with the various foreign tourists eager to discover places and activities and collect as many experiences as possible to achieve the final victory.

Move around Turin using cards available with electric bikes and scooters, buses, trams, taxis or subways trying to visit all the places indicated in your Destination cards and complete the tourist routes that link them using your card in the best way, from those dedicated to food and culture to the tour of the buildings and the squares that have been the backdrop to famous films.

The best set and collection of experience give more points to win.
Each completed stage will give you points, new goals and some news (write at the bottom of cards) about the city of Turin that you didn't know yet.

boardgame.name: Euthia: Torment of Resurrection – Fierce Powers
boardgame.description:
In the Fierce Powers expansion for Euthia: Torment of Resurrection, you will confront dark forces tormenting the land in new scenarios with unique mechanics to exploit and challenges to overcome. A new hero, Eltrea, joins the battle accompanied by her loyal pets who she controls using her powers. The expansion further enhances the variety and gameplay options of the core game with extra monsters, more modular map tiles, an additional type of elementals, and new abilities for each of the 6 core game heroes.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40K: Kill Team – Tac Ops Cards
boardgame.description:
This pack contains 2 sets of 27 Tac Ops cards for you and your opponent to use in games of Kill Team.

A copy of the Kill Team - Core Book, a set of Kill Team miniatures, and accessories, are necessary to use these cards.

This card pack is sold separately and provides the same cards contained in a Kill Team starter set. Individual Kill Team faction sets do not come with these cards which are necessary to play a game of Kill Team.

boardgame.name: 雪華 (Sekka)
boardgame.description:
雪華 (Sekka) is a card game from Japan. Players try to match the snowflakes on their own hand cards with those on cards played by the other players. Get 6 snowflakes matched to win.

The publisher says:
A simple but profound card game where the fewer cards and information you have, the faster the game progresses and the harder it is to win.

You have 5 cards in your hand and the first player to get 6 snowflake cards wins!

Look at your cards and your opponent's cards and match them to get the snowflake cards!
If you get the snowflake card, you will get good luck.

Each game is short and easy to play over and over again!
But if you're not careful, you might get a big upset!

少ない手札と情報で早いゲーム展開ゲームが進めば進むほど勝つのが難しくなるルールシンプルだけど奥深い絵合わせカードゲーム

手札は5枚、誰よりも早く6種類の雪の結晶カードを獲得できた人の勝ち！

自分の手札と相手の捨札を見て、役を揃えて雪の結晶カードを獲得しよう
雪うさぎのカードは揃えると幸運が訪れるかも？

1回のゲームも短く、気軽に何度も遊べるゲームです
でも、気を抜いてると大逆転されてしまうかも？

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000: Kill Team Essentials
boardgame.description:
If you’re just getting started with Kill Team or introducing someone new to the game, this handy kit has some of the most useful supplies. With plenty of cardboard token markers, six portable barricades and three combat gauges.

This item is sold separately but the individual content is the same as that found in Kill Team Starter Kits.

boardgame.name: Warhammer 40,000: Black Templars Dice Set
boardgame.description:
While they may not be holy relics of the faith, these Black Templar dice are still mighty weapons in their own right. Cast in a solid and shadowy dark grey and inked in a bone white hue, each die is emblazoned with the Black Templars icon in place of the six.

Contents: 20 dice

boardgame.name: Global Dragon Egg Conservation
boardgame.description:
from itch.io:

Welcome to GDEC!

Thank you for your interest in our company. We're incredibly excited to welcome you to the ranks of the Global Dragon Egg Conservation!

Journal each day with the Dragon Eggs you've been given to take care of.
Use a deck of cards to randomly generate story prompts, such as egg elements and preferred nesting materials!
Overcome adversity and grow along with your eggs!
Watch your beautiful babies fly away knowing you've done something amazing.

boardgame.name: Happy's Humble Burger Farm
boardgame.description: Congrats, you're hired! Serve customers and maintain the Happy's Humble Burger Farm restaurant alone on the overnight. But be careful; things fall apart if you mess up! After work, head home and keep your eyes open for a way to escape the Barnyard Buds and their fast food fever-dream.

boardgame.name: Mind Crawler
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Mind Crawler is a single-player RPG about progressing through a surreal internalized dungeon and overcoming material representations of abstract personal issues. The mechanics are very light, and the play resembles a cross between journaling and a creative writing exercise.

boardgame.name: Barwy Wojny
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Barwy Wojny to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający zamiast konwencjonalnego totemu wybrać dla postaci barwy wojenne. W sam raz dla osób, które chcą zagrać członkami starożytnych cywilizacji czy badassowych jednostek specjalnych.

boardgame.name: Bracia Mniejsi
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Bracia Mniejsi to dodatek do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na stworzenie i wykorzystanie w trakcie rozgrywki postaci zwierzęcia, które powstało z martwych, żeby zemścić się na ludziach. Postać taka może być interesującym urozmaiceniem gry, wyzwaniem dla prowadzącego ją gracza i okazją do zastanowienia się nad relacjami ludzi i zwierząt, nie tylko w wymyślonych uniwersach.

boardgame.name: Draugr
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Draugr to dodatek do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na stworzenie i wykorzystanie w trakcie gry postaci tytułowych draugrów - poległych bohaterów, którzy opuszczają Walhallę, by wymierzyć karę złoczyńcom, krzywoprzysięzcom i profanom.

Może to być znakomite urozmaicenie rozgrywki i okazja do wprowadzenia postaci z całkowicie innej epoki i kręgu kulturowego.

boardgame.name: Noir
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Niewielki dodatek pozwalający zagrać w Strzygi archetypicznymi postaciami z filmów noir. Dostępne opcje to:

- Detektyw
- Femme Fatal
- Postronny

Znajdzie się też kilka wskazówek odnośnie tonu i estetyki kina noir.

boardgame.name: Oblicza Kłamstwa
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Oblicza Kłamstwa to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na zastąpienie totemów z podręcznika podstawowego maskami karnawałowymi. Zapewniają one postaciom moce nieco bardziej subtelne niż większość totemów, świetnie nadające się do sesji skoncentrowanych na intrygach, manipulacji, zakulisowych manewrach na dworze, w biurze i tym podobnych środowiskach.

boardgame.name: Osiem Ostrzy Yokai
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Osiem Ostrzy Yokai to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi, pozwalający zamienić totem postaci na katanę opętaną przez złego ducha. Może to stanowić znakomite urozmaicenie rozgrywki, zwłaszcza jeśli akcja toczy się w Japonii, azjatyckiej dzielnicy wielkiego miasta bądź dotyczy konfrontacji z dalekowschodnimi korporacjami, bądź organizacjami przestępczymi.

boardgame.name: Osiem Ostrzy Yokai: Tajny Dodatek do Dodatku
boardgame.description:
From the introduction:

Strzyga może uwolnić yokai uwięzionego wewnątrz posiadanej katany. Ostrze zyskuje wówczas dodatkową moc, ale o świcie ono i jego posiadacz na zawsze obracają się w proch. O losie wyzwolonego demona uczestnicy muszą zdecydować wspólnie. Może ucieknie na koniec świata, może zacznie siać zniszczenie w mieście, a może ukryje się w jakimś innym przedmiocie.

User summary:

Intended for use with Osiem Ostrzy Yokai

boardgame.name: Raveloft
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Raveloft to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi zawierający materiały ułatwiające wprowadzenie do gry wątku imprezy typu rave. Znajdziesz tu porady, pomysły, całe mnóstwo tabel losowych i inspiracji do wykorzystania w trakcie gry, w tym długą listę płyt z muzyką elektroniczną wartych odsłuchania i wykorzystania w trakcie sesji.

boardgame.name: Skazańcy
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Skazańcy to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na zagranie postaciami osób skazanych (słusznie bądź nie) na karę śmierci i powracających z zaświatów, żeby zemścić się na śmiertelnikach. Czytelnik znajdzie tu zupełnie nowe moce, którymi dysponują postacie oraz problemy, z którymi będą musiały się zmierzyć.

Podobnie jak wszystkie inne suplementy do Strzyg, jest to materiał przeznaczony dla dojrzałego odbiorcy. Jeśli czujesz, że nie jest to coś dla ciebie, to możliwe, że lepiej zrobisz, zaglądając do jednej z wielu innych naszych publikacji.

boardgame.name: Stara Gwardia
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Stara Gwardia to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi, pozwalający na stworzenie i wykorzystanie w takcie gry postaci seniorów: ludzi starych, zgorzkniałych i zmęczonych, wykorzystanych i porzuconych przez system, zmarłych w żalu i gniewie. Powstają oni z martwych, żeby zemścić się na świecie, który potraktował ich jak śmieci.

Postać tego typu może być interesującym uzupełnieniem drużyny strzyg, umożliwiając wprowadzenie do gry różnic i konfliktów między pokoleniami.

boardgame.name: Ostatni Przyjazny Dom
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Ostatni Przyjazny Dom to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na wprowadzenie do gry strefy komfortu, w ramach której uczestnicy mogą odpocząć od silnych emocji i ciężkich tematów bez przerywania rozgrywki.

boardgame.name: Apokryfa
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Apokryfa to zbiór artykułów, esejów, opcjonalnych reguł i inspiracji do gry Strzygi. Poruszają one szeroki wachlarz tematów, od muzyki na sesje, przez opcjonalne elementy uniwersum, aż po zasady krzyżowania Strzyg z grami Fajerbol oraz Szlamy&Szkielety.

boardgame.name: Graffiti
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Graffiti to obszerny zbiór opcjonalnych reguł, pomysłów i inspiracji do gry Strzygi, przydatny zarówno dla graczy jak i dla narratorów.

Czytelnik znajdzie tu nowe totemy, nowe moce dla totemów już istniejących oraz pomysły na miejsca, postacie i sytuacje do wykorzystania w trakcie gry.

boardgame.name: Hang'em High
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Hang'em High to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi stworzony z myślą o rozgrywce w realiach szeroko pojętego Dzikiego Zachodu. Czytelnik znajdzie tu zasady tworzenia postaci kowbojów (i nie tylko) powracających zza grobu, by dokonać zemsty, garść podstawowych informacji o Zachodzie i całe mnóstwo pomocy oraz inspiracji do wykorzystania w trakcie gry.

boardgame.name: N-Born
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

N-Born to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na zagranie androidami walczącymi o wolność w ponurym, cyberpunkowym świecie przyszłości. Czytelnik znajdzie tu zasady tworzenia syntetycznych bytów próbujących osiągnąć niezależność we wrogim, dehumanizującym otoczeniu oraz szeroką gamę inspiracji i pomocy do wykorzystania w trakcie rozgrywki.

boardgame.name: Okultyzm
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Okultyzm to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi, umożliwiający wykorzystanie w czasie rozgrywki mistycznych rytuałów i artefaktów, pozwalających strzygom i śmiertelnikom wpływać na siebie nawzajem oraz podpisywać cyrografy.

Może to być użyteczny materiał dla osób pragnących wprowadzić do gry więcej mistycyzmu, a szczególnie mistycznych interakcji strzyg ze śmiertelnikami.
W podręczniku znajdują się informacje o tym, czym jest okultyzm w świecie strzyg, jak działa — zarówno od strony strzyg, jak i śmiertelników, jakie ryzyko ze sobą niesie oraz garść pomysłów na przygody z okultyzmem w tle.

boardgame.name: Pokutnicy
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Pokutnicy to suplement do gry fabularnej "Strzygi". Umożliwia on tworzenie i wykorzystywanie w trakcie rozgrywki postaci pokutników, powstałych z grobu istot pragnących (bądź zmuszonych) naprawić wyrządzoną za życia szkodę.
Zgromadzone tu zasady i wskazówki mogą być wykorzystywane samodzielnie (zastępują wówczas rozdział "Postacie" w podręczniku podstawowym), jak i w jednej drużynie z konwencjonalnymi postaciami strzyg (trzeba wówczas pamiętać, że pokutnicy posiadają potężniejszych patronów niż strzygi, a co za tym idzie — więcej niezwykłych zdolności).

UWAGA!

Przed rozpoczęciem przygody z "Pokutnikami" warto rozegrać przynajmniej jedną sesję zgodnie z podstawowymi zasadami "Strzyg", żeby zrozumieć klimat uniwersum i zasady gry.

boardgame.name: Posłańcy Piekieł
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Posłańcy Piekieł to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi umożliwiający wprowadzenie do gry postaci, którym patronuje nie zwierzęcy totem, a demon, uciekinier z piekła - dzielący się mocą, ale namawiający do złego. Może to być znakomite urozmaicenie dla osób szukających nowych, ciekawych opcji, mocy i pomysłów na postacie. Szczególnie takie powiązane z siłami ciemności, piekłem, demonami zemsty i mające skłonność do pędzenia przez pogrążone w mroku miasto na buchających płomieniami motocyklach.

W środku znajdują się:

- Alternatywne zasady tworzenia postaci - demonicznych strzyg,

- Podstawowe informacje o demonach w świecie gry, do dalszej eksploracji w trakcie rozgrywki,

- Dodatkowe pomoce i narzędzia do wykorzystania w trakcie rozgrywki.

boardgame.name: Powidoki
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Powidoki to zbiór artykułów, porad, generatorów, zasad opcjonalnych i innych materiałów do gry fabularnej Strzygi. W sam raz dla osób, które poszukują dodatkowych inspiracji, wsparcia przy graniu bądź prowadzeniu albo po prostu urozmaicenia rozgrywki.

boardgame.name: Rachenburg
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Z oceanu mgieł wyłania się ogromne miasto. Niegdyś była to zapierająca dech stolica dostatniego kraju. Dziś - ponure, rojące się od bandytów więzienie obłąkanego króla-rzeźnika i prześladujących go strzyg. Witajcie w Rachenburgu, mieście gotyckiego horroru, stolicy mordu, zemsty i rozpaczy.

Rachenburg to inspirowany grą Strzygi suplement do gier łączących elementy fantasy i gotyckiego horroru. Czytelnik znajdzie tutaj opis domeny grozy - tytułowego miasta Rachenburg, jego mrocznego władcy, Gabriela Schlafwandlera III, oraz klątwy nękającej rzeczonego monarchę.

Tekst zawiera najważniejsze informacje o domenie, jej władcach, rezydentach i możliwościach, którymi dysponują, ale nie zawiera zasad żadnej konkretnej gry: prowadzący musi samodzielnie zinterpretować opisy i dopasować je do zasad używanych przez grupę.

boardgame.name: Wiedźmy
boardgame.description:
Publisher's blurb:

Wiedźmy to suplement do gry fabularnej Strzygi pozwalający na stworzenie postaci straconych za rzekome uprawianie czarnej magii (najpewniej w średniowieczu, ale niekoniecznie). Czytelnik znajdzie tu zupełnie nowe moce (powiązane z metodą unicestwienia wiedźmy), fetysze, bogatą listę inspiracji i zbiór tabel z abstraktami przydatnymi w trakcie rozgrywki.

Jak wszystkie publikacje z serii Strzygi, jest to podręcznik przeznaczony dla dojrzałego odbiorcy.

boardgame.name: Necromance
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

A solo game about a witch trying to bring back their dead lover through necromancy.

Your lover died a tragic death. But you’ve been studying necromancy, so you know it doesn’t have to be permanent. In fact, you know a lot of helpful resources for the ritual can be found throughout the very forest you live in, if you’re willing to brave the dangers at night. As you traverse the forest through the cards you lay out, you weave the story of you and your lover while trying to bring them back.

boardgame.name: Novel Story
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Novel Story is a single-player role playing game about the history of a novel, its story, its adaptations, its influences. You'll select a character (a fan, academic, biographer, etc.) who is tracing the history of the novel and answer prompts to define the novel's story and themes, as well as publishers, adaptations, and more. By the end you'll have a unique story changed by many characters and through decades of time. Play to create a unique story, or to seed your fictional world with a ubiquitous piece of fiction adopted into several forms of media.

Tell the story of a magical young adult mystery about revenge, written by a well-read academic which was adapted into a streaming series!

Find out how a blue collar worker's first action/adventure novel was stolen by a fake publisher!

Explore the details of a bright science fiction story about dystopia and religion, adapted decades later into an indie video game!

boardgame.name: Военно-морская игра
boardgame.description:
"Военно-морская игра" (eng. "Naval game") is a pre-revolution Russian board game similar to Chess, 1907 made in Saint Petersburg.
From the carine government in 1908 this game won a bronze medal.

Each player controls 10 playing pieces - different warships.
Game play: At the beginning, the game figures are placed in specific squares on the game board (always the same as specified in the instructions). As in Chess, the different figures/ships moves on the game board in different ways and are removed when the square is occupied by another player.

The object of the game is to capture the opponent's Admiral ship (like a king).

boardgame.name: Haste Worte?: Das 2. wortreiche Würfelspiel
boardgame.description:
Roll the dice, choose a theme, combine motifs and write down words! Whoever finds the most words that no one else has written down wins! With Haste Worte - Das wortreiche Würfelspiel, 8 colorful dice have already joined the Haste Worte family. Starting in 2021, the dice will be supplemented with Haste Worte - Das 2. wortreiche Würfelspiel (You have Words? - The 2nd Wordy Dice Game) and feature new motifs for even more creative and witty rounds of play!

—description from the publisher (translated)

boardgame.name: Murder Off Miami
boardgame.description:
Documents, photographs, police and criminal reports, and pieces of evidence presented in the order they are received by Florida detective Kettering contain clues that allow the reader to determine who murdered British financier Bolitho Blane.

An early progenitor of the modern mystery suspect / cold case tabletop games.

listing.notes:
SP17/6647 SP17/6648
Italian version "Un Delitto al Largo di Miami"

SP17/6649
Hardcover version, english, 1986

SP17/6650
German version "Mord bei Miami"

SP17/6651
German version "Mord bei Miami"

boardgame.name: Age of Steam Expansion: Balkans
boardgame.description:
The Balkans, also known as the Balkan Peninsula, is a geographic area in Southeast Europe with various geographical and historical definitions.The region takes its name from the Balkan Mountains that stretch throughout the whole of Bulgaria. The Balkan Peninsula is bordered by the Adriatic Sea in the northwest, the Ionian Sea in the southwest, the Aegean Sea in the south, the Turkish Straits in the east, and the Black Sea in the northeast. The northern border of the peninsula is variously defined. The highest point of the Balkans is Mount Musala, 2,925 metres (9,596 ft), in the Rila mountain range, Bulgaria.

This expansion takes place in this beautiful area. It is designed for 3-4 players. The expansion uses the same rules as the original game, with the following exception: the 'Production' action is replaced with the 'Roma' action.

boardgame.name: Intrighi e Missive
boardgame.description:
This game was attached in ioGioco Magazine 23

Europe between the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries is that of the great absolutist monarchies where politics, diplomacy and war are decided in the gilded lounges ... or between the sheets of the alcoves.
Myriads of small states fragment the continent, becoming pawns in a complicated game between the Powers of Austria, France, England and Spain.
Their ambassadors have much of the adventurer: partly bankers and partly spies, they are skilled double agents who know how to juggle the intrigues of the Court.

Intrighi e Missive ("Intrigue and Missive") is a strategic game of conquest and war, where battles are won also thanks to the missions of our emissaries in the courts of the adversaries. Each of them will bring a secret message (white or black) which, once revealed, will trigger special actions capable of changing the balance between the powers.

boardgame.name: The Umbrella Academy: The Board Game
boardgame.description:
The Umbrella Academy: The Board Game is a co-operative game for 1-5 people in which the players work together as the Heroes from the famous Umbrella Academy.

To win, they must overcome a succession of dangerous hazards and defeat dastardly villains in order to save the world!

Each player has a hand of cards they can use to place Battle Tokens on potentially dangerous hazards and villains, or trigger special abilities unique to their chosen Hero.

The game is split into different phases - Play Phase (players take actions and move around the board), Draw Phase (draw new cards into their hand), Effect Phase (resolve the effects of Hazards and Villains), and Crisis Phase (generate new Hazards).

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Déole
boardgame.description:
Déole is a Roll&Write Adventure game.

Carried by the winds (the dices), You will travel on a shared exploration map, while completing your own navigation sheet, where your dices and scores become your experience.

Déole is indefinitely replayable, thanks to multiple dice combinations principles, and more challenging scenarios and dilemmas from Sailor level, to captain level.

—description from the designer

listing.notes:
Game is as new.
FREE SHIPPING TO EUROPE AND NORTH AMERICA !!!
Any boardgames order from this list starting from: $250 and above (EU zone) $360 and above (rest of Europe) $500 and above (USA and Canada) will ship FOR FREE, including sturdy package and tracking number !!! Any other destination country will also get very special shipping prices, almost free, ask for details !!

boardgame.name: Jihad
boardgame.description:
Back Cover blurb


Perhaps a thousand years ago the A.I. awoke and started its war against humanity. Thousands of star systems were destroyed, thousands of billions were killed by its rampant destruction. Humanity waged a war of survival against the robot hordes, and died.

The "True Human" religion changed the tide. With the religious war, the Jihad, they paid in blood to beat back the robotic hordes.

Jihad is a history of humanity's war against the robots, a war so terrible that its lessons echoed through history and created a legacy that bans artificial intelligence right up to today.

Designed for the Cepheus Engine of other 2D6 based RPG systems, it gives you a history that you can drop into your game, as events of the distant past or as inspiration for a campaign set during the war itself.

boardgame.name: STOP by ZERO
boardgame.description:
STOP by ZERO is a push your luck card game from Japan. Players draw cards from a deck. The cards show numbers with either + or x for addition or multiplication. As players accumulate cards, they increase the player's score. But if they draw a x0 card, their score is now zero.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Shiki Hasekawa (ハセカワ シキ)
boardgame.boardgameartist: Shiki Hasekawa (ハセカワ シキ)

boardgame.name: Hollywood Racers: Racers of the Lost Arena
boardgame.description:
Your races can now be played by up to 6 players!

10 new Drivers! 3 new boards! 2 new Managers! 3 new gaming modes (Solo, Arena and Championship)

boardgame.name: Operation Nordwind 1945: The Last German Offensive in the West
boardgame.description:
Operation Nordwind 1945 is an introductory level, card-assisted game depicting Germany’s last offensive in the west from December 31, 1944 – January 20, 1945. The game concentrates on the fighting that took place in the mountainous, heavily-forested terrain of the Alsace region of France. Historically, the German offensive failed in its attempt to secure the Saverne Gap – needed to unleash its Panzers in order to cut off the U.S. Seventh Army and perhaps gain a political settlement to the war in the west.

- From the Publisher

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Hollywood Racers: Metal Vehicles
boardgame.description:
A set of 20 metal vehicles to be used as alternate to the cardboard standees from the main game and its expansion.
Also includes a metal first player token.

boardgame.name: Contraseña
boardgame.description: An Argentinian 1990's logical deduction word game.

boardgame.name: Iguana James
boardgame.description:
An Argentinian 1996 deduction and adventure game.

You find yourself in the exotic, timeless, hot city of Al Habub, in the shoes of archaeologist and adventurer Iguana James. As Iguana, you solve all kinds of cases that your friends and enemies throw at you. To do so, look for clues in the most interesting places in the city, from the Posada de los Ladrones to the Pythonisa's house, from the Museum to the editorial office of the Dromediario. You can declare Sites of Archaeological Interest to prevent your opponents from advancing... or you can open Sites of Interest etc. declared by them. You can use the Talisman of Swift Foot to move quickly through the city. And all to identify the culprit, explain the unlikely, and have a beer in the company of the old barman.

boardgame.name: Tango de Mente
boardgame.description:
An Argentinian 1990's card game about tango.


This is a very original and entertaining board game. The box (black) contains the rules (red) in Spanish and English and the cards (blue box). Illustrated by Hermenegildo Sábat, it is a purely porteño game made up of characters such as the Chanta, the Curda, the Muñeca Brava, the Viejita, and Carlos Gardel, among others.

—description from Museo del Libro "Gardel y su Tiempo"


Play a tango!

From the stories that tango lyrics tell, Tango de Mente was born, a new deck and a pastime to practice with friends.

Sitting the players at the table, the cards come and go. When playing Curda, the values are reversed and a lower number wins over a higher number. Where the Chanta appears, the best card does not win, but the one that follows in value. Muñeca Brava beats any man, even Carlos Gardel. In turn, Cafishio beats any woman, even the Viejita. When Garufa appears, there is a party and the one who wins the trick has to give it away. Misteriosa Mascarita is a card with gender to define, will it be male, will it be papusa?

The game is learned quickly and its rules barely occupies the first four pages of the book. The rest of the volume links pieces of tangos, memorable lyrics that act as background music for the game, breathing life into it and giving thickness to each card.

—description from the book back cover


¡Juéguese un tango!

A partir de las historias que cuentan las letras de tango nació Tango de Mente, una nueva baraja y un pasatiempo para practicar entre amigos.

Sentados los jugadores a la mesa, las cartas van y vienen. Cuando se juega Curda, los valores se invierten y un número menor pasa a ganarle a uno mayor. Donde aparece el Chanta no gana la mejor carta, sino la que le sigue en valor. Muñeca Brava le gana a cualquier hombre, incluso a Carlos Gardel. A su vez, Cafishio le gana a cualquier mujer, incluso a la Viejita. Cuando aparece Garufa, hay fiesta y el que gana la baza tiene que regalarla. Misteriosa mascarita es una carta con sexo a definir, ¿será varón, será papusa?

El juego se aprende rápido y su reglamento ocupa apenas las cuatro páginas iniciales del libro. El resto del volumen liga retazos de tangos, letras memorables que hacen de música de fondo para la partida, soplándole vida y dándole espesor a cada naipe.

—Spanish description

boardgame.name: Tawantinsuyu: Das goldene Zeitalter
Tawantinsuyu: The Golden Age
boardgame.description:
Pachacuti’s leadership allows the people of Cuzco to build their empire faster, better, and further than it was possible ever before. A new class of citizenry emerges: nobles, supporting their great leader with their wisdom and riches. If you hope to be Pachacuti’s successor and maintain the level of prosperity currently known to our people, keep these nobles happy and build them palaces worthy of their status! Sounds of your constructions will echo far and wide beyond the mountain ranges of Antikuna, inspiring newcomers to travel east to bask in your glory. While the priests debate whether they should follow the path of Ruruy (growth, fruit bearing) or Simpa (braiding, entwining) to worship the sun god Inti, your advisors tell you to look to the four suyu (region) you’ve conquered. Not just for plunder, but to learn from these vassal nations, and use their expertise to bring glory to the Inca. Do you have what it takes to be the leader of the Realm of the Four Parts in this Golden Age?

This expansion contains 4 modules:

The “Way of the Sun” module introduces two alternative layouts for the Sun Temple.
The “Vassals of the Inca” module introduces a new secondary action that lets you utilize the specialties of the other nations your armies (or other players’ armies) conquer.
The “Nobles and Newcomers” module is the largest of the new modules, and it introduces a number of new features: a new Building type, newcomer workers, and several new Passive Buildings
The “Pachamama” module is an improved and streamlined solo opponent for the game, based on (and replacing) Axomamma.
Additionally, this expansion contains 8 new Passive Buildings, that can be added to the game regardless of playing with any of the modules or not.


—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Tipni si!: Česko
boardgame.description:
You don't have to have a bloated head like a balloon in the Take a Guess! You just need a good guess or try your luck. How many people write in the Czech Republic with their left hand? How deep is Macocha? How many times has Karel Čapek been nominated for the Nobel Prize? The game is packed with lots of interesting facts, curiosities and records, so you only need to get at least three players and you can start betting.

Players bet on the dates, population, area and many other variables, earning points for the right tip or for betting on the opponent's correct tip.

—description from the publisher (translated)

Nemusíte mít hlavou nafouklou vědomostmi jako balón, v párty hře Tipni si! Česko stačí dobrý odhad nebo zkusit štěstí. Kolik lidí píše v Česku levou rukou? Jak hluboká je Macocha? Kolikrát byl Karel Čapek nominován na Nobelovu cenu? Hra je napěchovaná spoustou zajímavostí, kuriozit a rekordů, takže stačí sehnat alespoň tři hráče a můžete se pustit do tipování.

Hráči tipují letopočty, počty obyvatel, rozlohu a spoustu dalších veličin, přičemž body získávají za správný tip nebo za to, že vsadili na správný tip soupeře.

V této párty hře na vás čeká 1188 otázek rozdělených do 6 okruhů - Zeměpis, Dějiny, Kultura, Příroda, Sport a Různé. Tipni si Česko je možné zkombinovat se základní hrou Tipni si.
Hra Tipni si Česko obsahuje: 396 karet s otázkami, 6 mazatelných destiček, 6 fixů s mazátkem, 80 plastových bodovacích žetonů, 6 barevných hráčských žetonů a pravidla.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: わたしがシンデレラ！ (Watashi Ga Cinderella)
boardgame.description:
わたしがシンデレラ！ (Watashi Ga Cinderella) is a tile placement game from Japan. Players are Cinderella's, trying to gather their things and get to the palace first. A Cinderella needs her coach, glass slippers and ballgown. These sit in different places in the forest, and Cinderella must walk around the forest and collect them.

Players take turns to lay down tiles showing paths in the forest. Pathways must connect, and on some cards are the three treasures. At the top is the Palace, and the path leads there. Players place tiles and move their piece around, until they have crossed the three treasures and head for the Palace. The first to get there complete wins.
user summary
boardgame.boardgamedesigner: Shiki Hasekawa (ハセカワ シキ)
boardgame.boardgameartist: Shiki Hasekawa (ハセカワ シキ)

boardgame.name: Egyszer volt...
boardgame.description:
Once upon a time… not a literature quiz! Focus on the stories! We ask you to write your own bestseller!

Just like in an unforgettable novel, there are big laughs or even deep conversations waiting for you in this game. Once upon a time, there was no one - there was once a character you bring to life…, a dramatic turn that no one expects…, and the end result that puts the crown on your work. Creativity, playfulness, communication, imagination - all of which you will need in this great party game where the story can only be limited by your own imagination. Move the threads skillfully and be the best storyteller on your team!

The game lasts for 10 rounds. The first 9 rounds have 3 phases, Inspiration, Writing, and Evaluation.
In the Inspiration phase, we draw 2 characters, 2 dramas and 2 end cards to the playing field.
In the Writing phase, each player thinks about which combination of 3 cards they think could make the most interesting story. It is important that you choose one of each category.

Everyone will write on their page the letter combinations (for example, BAA) of the selected pages next to the current round number.
In the first three rounds, the text of the selected Character Cards is recorded, in rounds 4-6 the text of the selected Drama card, and in rounds 7-9 the text of the End Card.

In the Rating phase, players receive points for each of their teammates who have selected the same letter combination for their story. If exactly the same combination is written, everyone gets 4 points, if only the first 2 letters match, 2 points, if only the first letter matches, 1 point goes. No points are awarded if the first letter of the letter combination does not match anyone.

The tenth round is the Synopsis. In this round, we do not put new cards on the game board, but the Inspiration phase takes place from the texts of the previously selected cards. So in the Inspiration phase, we write the final story from the text of the 3-3-3 inspiration cards previously written on the scorecard.
As everyone completes in a row, tell the Final Story one after the other. Don’t forget to give the story a title.
After telling the Final Story, players secretly give each other points. Everyone can split 7 points among the other players, we give the most to the one who we think invented the best story.
After telling the story, everyone adds up the victory points earned during the 9+1 rounds.

boardgame.name: San Francisco
boardgame.description:
For San Francisco, the first half of the 20th century is an era of dynamic growth and new opportunities. It's also a chance for you — junior urban planner — to take part in a contest for the most amazing reconstruction plan of the city. Sit down with your sketchbook and create a project that will make you stand out from the competition. Design a beautiful city in this game by Reiner Knizia, world-famous board game designer.

In the board game San Francisco, you become an urban planner whose goal is to create the greatest redevelopment plan of the famous city in California. Design districts in each of the five types, racing against all the other planners. Choose the right moment to take on new projects — but be careful, if you take on too many projects it'll be harder to gain more. Earn more prestige by cleverly designing a system of cable car connections. Lay foundations and carefully design the nearby landscape, allowing you to build new skyscrapers. Create a new vision of San Francisco that will gain the most rewards, and win through fame and recognition.

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

boardgame.name: Şokopop
boardgame.description:
Ask your friends about 90's Turkish pop culture. One person becomes the judge and reads the card. Who ever answers first gets the point. Most Points wins the game!

—user summary

Kavga, polemik, basitlik, skandal...Hepsi bir kutuda bir araya geldi! Şokopop ekibi, siz ve kankeytolarınızın eğlenerek magazin bilgilerinizi yarıştırmanız için kolay, orta ve zor olmak üzere toplam 200 soru çıkardı. Size de oynamak ve sürpriz joker kartlarla uzmanlığınızı kanıtlamak kaldı. Şansınız bol olsun!

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Mother of Monsters Player's Guide
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Isles of Adventure Inspired by Greek Mythology!

The 64-page Mother of Monsters Player’s Guide brings your players insights into the politics and geography of their realm, alongside new player options to create heroes unique to the Kagari Islands. This spoiler-free resource has all the information your player’s need and nothing they don't, including new races, classes, feats, spells, and even a custom language!

6 new player lineages, including galbiska, maegalin, centaur, minotaur, pikari merfolk, and the variant humans of the Kagari Isles.
New class options for barbarians, bards, fighters, and monks.
Expanded background options for the core 5E character backgrounds, as well as new backgrounds like Shield Daughter of Kamorra and Demigod!
Over a dozen new feats and spells like Gigantism, Horned Warrior, thunder stomp, and zephyr movement!
Make your Mother of Monsters DnD 5th Edition campaign truly legendary with the incredible options for your players and the handy guide to common knowledge in the campaign in this Player's Guide!

boardgame.name: Mother of Monsters GM's Guide
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Sinister Secrets for Epic Greek Adventure

The 40-page Mother of Monsters GM's Guide brings you a wealth of insider information on the epic adventure opportunities to be found in the Kagari Isles. You'll find lore about the hidden history of these lands and seas, from the Age of the Titans to the Age of Despair and the current Children of Maigara. You'll likewise find and expansive gazetteer of the people and places of the archipelago, with beautiful maps, fiendish factions and organizations, and so much more! Plus, you'll find new DnD 5E bonus material ijn this book too, like:

New magic items like the shield of reflection and amulet of the tabiski.
Ready-to-use NPC stat blocks like the amazon archer and naga-folk warlock.
Sinister new monsters like the faelori giant and the unique laesuri - the "Dread Ones" like Onazoka, the Crawling Hunger and Ehura Sutara, the Slithering Darkness!

boardgame.name: Stone Mother's Assault
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Underworld Awakens!

Bandits and monsters are terrorizing the roadways, sahuagin prowl the fishing lanes, the cults commit human sacrifice, and all the while arrogant nobles challenge the king's authority. This is Boskari, an island nation on the western edge of the Kagari Islands, and before it can be saved its citizens must learn whether these calamities are independent of each other or led by a sinister force.

This incredible 106-page DnD 5E adventure for 1st-4th level characters is inspired by the epic mythology of Ancient Greece. Pit your heroes against the monstrous minions of the Underworld as they set forth on the Mother of Monsters Adventure Path. In this adventure, your heroes must uncover the plots of ambitious nobles, brave haunted forests, infiltrate war camps, and delve into the Underworld to face an evil thought long gone from the world.

boardgame.name: Jobus Tombs
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Amir of Seldos has called upon the quartet of brave adventurers to assist him in an endeavor. His son, and only heir, has recently contracted Lycanthropy and no one has been able to deliver a cure to the young prince. One cure is known, however it is tucked away in a tomb of former leaders that were...evil. Designed for four, nineth level PCs!

This offering was a great time for the Murder Hobo Inc. podcast show on Twitch.

boardgame.name: The Forgotten Library
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Legends tell of a mystical library, where great sages and icons of the realm once convened in discussion and study, overseeing the world through a network of strange arcane instruments... However, the library was all but abandoned as the sages mysteriously vanished many centuries ago. This adventure begins as the players unearth a mysterous tome that seems drawn to the fabled library, knowing nothing of the secrets that lie within. This adventure will test your players through riddles, puzzles, and encounters with the illusory remnants of the great sages.

boardgame.name: Werewolves' Trial
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Upon entering the sleepy countryside town of Hundlehurst, the players are immediately apprehended by the town guard and placed in prison. After a rung of savage attacks on villagers, by what have only been described as savage beasts under the full moon, the players will have to convince the town's court of their innocence. Once deemed innocent, the players will get to fully explore the strange town of Hundlehurst – and find the real culprit behind the gruesome murders!

This semi-randomized horror-themed adventure is roleplaying and investigation heavy, where players will have to solve the mystery of the werewolves – before it's too late! They will have to interact with the townsfolk to put together all of the clues to find the perpetrator before the entire town is turned into lycans! This adventure is best played roleplay heavy and rules light; feel free to improvise within the framework and, most importantly, have fun!

boardgame.name: Temple of The Seven Sands
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

The Temple of The Seven Sands is desert-themed adventure where explorers, bandits, and the players' party are all on the trail of a priceless artifact hidden in the dunes. The players then find themselves in the ruins of an ancient temple, where they will have to solve the puzzles and fend off the long-slumbering creatures within. While this adventure traditionally takes place in a desert wasteland, you could also make minor setting adjustments to run in different biomes as well.

boardgame.name: SideQuests Vol. V
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

SideQuests are a collection of short adventures designed for Fifth Edition. These one-shot style campaigns are designed to be compelling standalone stories that can be implemented, played through, and completed in just a few sessions. Whether you're using them as a filler adventure between major story arcs, as a continuation of your own adventures, or just because you forgot to plan the session last Wednesday... SideQuests are an invaluable tool for any DM!

This digital PDF bundle constitutes the fourth collection of SideQuests adventures:
SideQuests: The Train Between Planes
SideQuests: Wreckage of The Crimson Cove
SideQuests: Werewolves' Trial
SideQuests: The Forgotten Library
SideQuests: Temple of The Seven Sands

boardgame.name: Wondrous Gifts: The Benevolence of the Celestials
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

"I have no idea why it chose me, honestly. And there have been some days that I wished it hadn’t. But we all have our burdens, I suppose. And mine’s hardly something to complain about."
- Embry Burrows, Blessed Brawler

Throughout the course of their adventures, heroes and villains alike find themselves before beings of tremendous power. Not quite gods but certainly far beyond mortals, these creatures come from a variety of backgrounds and planes, from the celestial to the abyssal, from the sylvan to the necrotic.

The experiences that come from crossing paths with these entities vary as much as the beings themselves, and although it’s almost universally agreed that it’s far safer to avoid any such meetings to the fullest extent possible, these risky encounters offer the opportunity to gain truly wondrous gifts.

The following is an example of a new play option called wondrous gifts. These gifts are granted very rarely and typically only after some sort of extraordinary circumstance or event that the player has survived. Each wondrous gift comes with its own mechanical prerequisites and enhancements, as well as drawbacks that the player may face as a result of their new gift.

This supplement includes:

The mechanics and lore for a new play option to add to your games, wondrous gifts.
The Benevolence, or the Light of Ehlundia, and the powers and responsibilities this celestial blessing provides.

boardgame.name: シティコネクト (City Connect)
boardgame.description:
シティコネクト (City Connect) is a city building game from Japan. Players draw from a draft and lay out city cards in their own tableaus. The cards are in 10 different types. Each card has costs, paid for by the cards built before, and gives the city more benefits. Players aim to build monument cards too, and to get majority bonuses. Players win by gaining the most victory points.
user summary

boardgame.name: Die Olchis: Müffel-Knüffel
boardgame.description:
This game is a Yahtzee variant for kids.

The dice contain icons instead of numbers, and special dice combinations need to be played.

The game is designed with the "Olchis", a green family of creatures designed by Erhard Dietl.
boardgame.boardgamefamily: Creatures: Die Olchis (designed by Erhard Dietl)

boardgame.name: Hearth & Hillside Home
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Hearth & Hillside Home is a short zine filled with random tables to inspire cosy moments of comfort in your fantasy games! Filled with domestic bliss, tantalising treats and Halfling hospitality, your character will never want to go on a no-good rotten adventure ever again!

Within its pages you'll find:

Refreshments to warm the heart: Random tables of food and drinks for your cosy non-adventures.
Sights seen between here and there: A random table of sights to gossip about.
Entirely true tales from beyond the High Hedge: Rumours of the of what the world is like beyond the borders of the Cosy Commonwealth.
And more!

This zine was inspired by the world of Under Hill, By Water, Rise Up Comus's (rather incredible) game of living the simple life of a carefree Halfling. It has been designed specifically for use with that game as part of the Yuletide Jam, but perfectly suited to moments of respite in any fantasy game!

boardgame.name: Caravaneer
boardgame.description:
From itch.io:

Build a walking castle for your party or NPCs with this Artificer Specialist for DND 5E!

Every adventuring party needs a safe place to rest. A Caravaneer is a master of hospitality who maintains and provides a smoking magical vehicle to act as a home away from home for any diligent traveler.

This product includes:

The #1 most upvoted Artificer subclass on Reddit
Stats for the Arcane Caravan, a mobile home that's bigger on the inside
Rules and tables for creating a Sentient Host NPC for any vehicle

boardgame.name: Shards of Tomorrow (Second Edition)
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Yo, Sentient. Over here.

You are part of a crew of other sentients. Some crews call themselves ‘mercenaries’, others use the term ‘bounty hunters’. Some are ‘contracted security teams’ specifically employed by one of the more powerful guilds, while others are ‘freelance operatives’, finding or fighting for the highest bidder. Regardless, you are a band of brothers, sisters, and you’re not sure what that amorphous gelatinous thing is, but everyone calls it ‘Dav’. You travel the stars (or at least, around this star), jumping planets - and probably breaking a few hearts along the way.

Shards of Tomorrow: Second Edition is a roleplaying game of rollicking space adventure, where myth meets fantastic science.

boardgame.name: Cult of Tanit
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:
Mystery cults are secret societies that exist within religious institutions. Like other secret societies, their existence is well known, but their rituals, lore, and objectives are concealed. Only the initiated are allowed access to these secrets.

This file provides an overview of mystery cults and specific details about the Cult of Tanit, one of the most fearsome deities in the Amazons vs Valkyries setting.

Features:

Sample cult secrets
The location of Tanit's temples and shrines
Rites held in Tanit's honor
Brief history and methods of the cult
1 New Magic Item (Tanit's Emblem)
1 New Spell (Necromantic Surge)
The Oath of the Moon's Bond for Tanit's paladins

boardgame.name: Papillon Gardens
boardgame.description:
Papillion: Gardens is a roll and stamp game for 1-5 players. Using traditional roll and write mechanics as well as unique flower and feature stamps, players compete to build the most attractive garden.

—description from the publisher

boardgame.name: Der Herr der Ringe: Das Kartenspiel – Durins Zwerge Starterdeck
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Revised Core: Dwarves of Durin Starter Deck
Le Seigneur des Anneaux: Le Jeu de Cartes – Les Nains de Durin
El señor de los anillos: El juego de cartas – Edicion revisada: Enanos de Durin
Il Signore degli Anelli: Il Gioco di Carte – Revised Core Set: Mazzo Precostruito Nani di Durin
boardgame.description:
The proud, hardy Dwarves are known throughout Middle-earth for their tenacity, strength, and craftsmanship. From the members of the Traveling Company to the noble line of Durin, the Dwarves are a well-known and well-loved part of The Lord of the Rings lore, and now players can bring the strength of these earthen folk to their games of The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game! Always at home in caves and mines, the Dwarves specialize in delving through their decks to search for treasures and play allies and attachments for fewer resources than usual. Beyond that, they can call upon their Dwarven pride and work together to steamroll any foe!

For players who are fond of the many Dwarf characters of The Lord of the Rings and their hearty fortitude, they will love the Dwarves of Durin Starter Deck! This expansion comes with a 53-card pre-built deck, giving players the chance to start playing right out of the box.

-description from publisher

For players who are fond of the graceful Elves of The Lord of the Rings and their incredible adaptability, they will love the Elves of Lórien Starter Deck! This expansion comes with a 53-card pre-built deck, giving players the chance to start playing right out of the box.

-description from publisher

For players who enjoy come-from-behind victories and never backing down, they will love the Defenders of Gondor Starter Deck! This expansion comes with a 53-card pre-built deck, giving players the chance to start playing right out of the box.

-description from publisher

boardgame.name: Der Herr der Ringe: Das Kartenspiel – Reiter von Rohan Starterdeck
The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game – Revised Core: Riders of Rohan Starter Deck

El Señor de los Anillos: El juego de cartas – Edición revisada: Jinetes de Rohan
Il Signore degli Anelli: Il Gioco di Carte – Revised Core Set: Mazzo Precostruito Cavalieri di Rohan
boardgame.description:
The noble warriors of Rohan, the Rohirrim, have always been renowned for their cavalry. Masters of horses and friends of Gondor, the riders of Rohan charge into battle against the Enemy with a great rallying cry, and now players can experience the thrill of this charge in The Lord of the Rings: The Card Game. The Rohirrim focus on powerful hit-and-run tactics, dashing into and out of battle in a gameplay style reminiscent of a cavalry charge.

For players who enjoy having unrelenting momentum and constantly pressuring their foes, they will love the Riders of Rohan Starter Deck! This expansion comes with a 53-card pre-built deck, giving players the chance to start playing right out of the box.

—description from publisher

boardgame.name: Fey Encounters
boardgame.description:
From publisher blurb:

Fey Encounters is a collection of 60 random encounters set in the Fey Realm for fifth edition fantasy. These encounters are designed to capture the whimsical yet dangerous atmosphere the Fey are known for. This is an ideal companion for a campaign based in the Fey Realm.

boardgame.name: Fri-Ho-Di Würfel-Spiel
boardgame.description:
A typical roll and move type promotional board game. Published to celebrate 50 years of Homann Margarine.

The players take turns to roll and move. They start at space 1. The first to reach space 50 wins the game. On some spaces events hinder or benefit the players.

The game board shows the production process of "Homann Margarine".

boardgame.name: Guns or Treasure
boardgame.description:
Guns or Treasure is a speedy game of buccaneering and bluffing! It has a beautiful shipbuilding aesthetic, excellent replayability and a wide demographic appeal. Throw it in a purse to entertain your kids or carry it in your pocket to add some rowdy fun to pub time with the guys.

Each player secretly builds their ships by laying down 10 cards. Cards add guns, treasure or a bomb to your ships. The players then take turns marauding other players’ ships or retreating to safety. Marauding is the key to victory, since a successful attack means you score the treasure from both ships, but beware! Their ships may be well-equipped with guns or rigged with a bomb! The player with the most treasure wins.

—description from the designer

boardgame.name: Pin 2 Win!
boardgame.description:
Pin 2 Win! combines Bible trivia with 7 life skill categories (camping, health & fitness, recreation, world missions, arts & crafts, Bible facts, nature).

Players roll the dice to move around the track. They must answer a questions in the subject of the space they land on, collecting merits tokens and pins.

The first player get to the collect seven merit tokens and a pin wins the game!

boardgame.name: 1941: Race to Moscow – Giant Playing Mat
boardgame.description:
1260 x 840 mm, 2 mm thick, one side printed eco-leather playing mat. The mat is language independent.

This item replaces the game board in the core game but is not required and only enhances existing game play.

listing.notes:
CLS Games - Atlanta's Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new.
